name: Fix Bugs Systematically
description: Playbook for systematically identifying, reproducing, and fixing bugs

steps.title: Reproduce the Bug
steps.description: Create a reliable way to reproduce the issue
actions: Gather detailed information about the bug report
Create minimal test case that reproduces the issue
Document exact steps to reproduce
Verify the bug exists in current codebase
Test across different environments if applicable

steps.title: Analyze Root Cause
steps.description: Understand the underlying cause of the bug
actions: Use debugger to step through problematic code
Add logging to understand data flow
Review recent changes that might have introduced the bug
Check for edge cases and boundary conditions
Look for similar bugs in issue tracker
validation: Impact of the bug is understood

steps.title: Design the Fix
steps.description: Plan a solution that addresses the root cause
actions: Consider multiple solution approaches
Evaluate impact on existing functionality
Design fix to be minimal and targeted
Plan for edge cases and error handling
Consider if architecture changes are needed

steps.title: Implement the Fix
steps.description: Code the solution with proper testing
actions: Implement the minimal fix required
Add or update tests to cover the bug scenario
Test the fix against the reproduction case
Run existing test suite to check for regressions
Add logging or monitoring if appropriate
validation: Bug is fixed in reproduction case

steps.title: Verify Fix and Monitor
steps.description: Ensure the fix works and monitor for issues
actions: Test fix in staging environment
Verify fix addresses original bug report
Monitor for any new issues after deployment
Document the fix and lessons learned
Update any related documentation

common_pitfalls.issue: Fixing symptoms instead of root cause
common_pitfalls.solution: Always trace back to the fundamental issue causing the bug

common_pitfalls.issue: Making changes that are too broad
common_pitfalls.solution: Keep fixes minimal and targeted to reduce regression risk
Test boundary conditions and error scenarios

common_pitfalls.issue: Introducing new bugs while fixing existing ones
common_pitfalls.solution: Run comprehensive test suite and use careful code review

success_criteria: Root cause is addressed, not just symptoms
Similar bugs are prevented in the future
